name: Puri Urban Leprosy Project
briefDescription: The Puri Urban Leprosy Project is working since 1981 in Puri urban area for elimination of leprosy and from 2003 also for control of Tuberculosis.The Project has cured about 9,000 leprosy patients and about 4,000 tuberculosis cases.The Project working for health education,diagnosis,treatment,rehabilitation,counselling and also referral services.Presently eight personnel working in the Project.
